title: (x) Secretsundaze logo (almost like Arial Black) - Tahoma/Verdana {Jan E/Florian}
content:
Hello all, I was wondering if you help me identify this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603021432im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/secretsundaze_logo_6140.png)

It’s from here - [http://www.secretsundaze.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603021432/http:/www.secretsundaze.net/ "http://www.secretsundaze.net/")

Cheers!

Mike

 [‹ (x) rue de Rochechouart contemporary sans - Bureau Grotesque {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603021432/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42653 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Handwritten script on website - Handwriting Dakota {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603021432/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42621 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mikeanegus

comments.content:
Hi Mike,

isn’t that Verdana Bold?  
F
tahoma bold it is...many thanks guys...
What’s the difference between Tahoma and Verdana (besides spacing)?

\> What’s the difference between Tahoma and Verdana (besides spacing)?

I always find it hard to tell, but I think Verdana is a bit wider than Tahoma.
